qas.question: The Dominican Order received influence from what monastic order?
What type of order was the Dominican Order?
What did previous religious orders do for a living?
How did the Dominican Order earn money?

plausible_answers.text: to establish a new kind of order, one that would bring the dedication and systematic education of the older monastic orders

qas.question: What did Dominic not seek to do?
What order did not influence the Dominican Order?

plausible_answers.text: a preaching order, trained to preach in the vernacular languages

qas.question: What did the Dominican Order not seek to be?

plausible_answers.text: earning their living on vast farms

qas.question: How did previous religious orders not do for a living?

context: Dominic sought <b4_0>to establish a new kind of order, one that would bring the dedication and systematic education of the older monastic orders<b4_0/> like <a0_0><b5_0>the Benedictines<b5_0/><a0_0/> to bear on the religious problems of the burgeoning population of cities, but with more organizational flexibility than either monastic orders or the secular clergy. Dominic's new order was to be <a1_0><b6_0>a preaching order<a1_0/>, trained to preach in the vernacular languages<b6_0/>. Rather than <b7_0>earning their living on vast <a2_0>farms<b7_0/><a2_0/> as the monasteries had done, the new friars would survive <a3_0>by begging<a3_0/>, "selling" themselves through persuasive preaching.
